channel.title: Can you solve this? REP++
channel.description:
randomly this error will crash my server
[code] [3/23/12 3:43 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 [3/23/12 3:43 PM]: at server.world.WalkingHandler$TiledMap.getFlag(WalkingH andler.java:67) [3/23/12 3:43 PM]: at server.world.WalkingHandler.traversable(WalkingHandle r.java:27) [3/23/12 3:43 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPC.getNextWalkingDirection(NPC.jav a:224) [3/23/12 3:43 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPC.getNextNPCMovement(NPC.java:235 ) [3/23/12 3:43 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.followPlayer(NPCHandler. java:2736) [3/23/12 3:43 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 1853) [3/23/12 3:43 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:191) [/code]
line 67 of walkinghandler.java
[code] public int getFlag(int x, int y) { return plane[x * 10000 + y]; } [/code]
IF ANYONE CAN TELL ME HOW TO FIX THIS I WILL LOVE YOU FOREVER :) 10 rep if u solve :) im completely stumped:L

item.title: Can you solve this? REP++
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

I’m guessing someone/something is walking where it isn’t supposed to?
